      void Cell.addPlayer(Player newPlayer)
      This method adds a new player in the double linked list started by firstPlayer
      pre: newPlayer is not null
      pos: The double linked list contained in firstPlayer has a new element
      void GameGrid.movePlayer(Player player, int dice)
      Method to move the player in the game grid
      pre: Player is not null
      pos: the player is assigned in the final cell which is defined using the current player position and dice
